definition: sticky/glutinous/(Tw) to adhere/to stick on/to glue

sentences.english: The mucous cells secrete acid mucopolysaccharides.
sentences.chinese: 黏液細胞分泌酸性黏多糖。

sentences.english: How can you cause mucus to flow upward and out of your lungs?
sentences.chinese: 怎樣才能引起黏液向上流動，離開肺部呢？

sentences.english: Among patients with myxoma and neurologic symptoms.
sentences.chinese: 在黏液瘤併發神經系統症狀的患者中。

sentences.english: The incidence of tuberculous bursitis is very low.
sentences.chinese: 結核性黏液囊炎發生率非常低。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the diagnosis and treatment of cardiac myxomas and decrease misdiagnosis.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討心臟黏液瘤診治的經驗，減少誤診。

sentences.english: Result Many cases did not have especial symptoms, misdiagnoses were inevitable in some cases.
sentences.chinese: 結果許多心臟黏液瘤患者症狀不典型，容易誤診。

sentences.english: Conclusions Good surgical outcome of cardiac myxomas could be achieved with operation.
sentences.chinese: 結論心臟黏液瘤手術治療效果良好。

sentences.english: Conclusion Superficial angiomyxoma is a rare benign tumor of soft tissues.
sentences.chinese: 結論淺表性血管黏液瘤是罕見的良性軟組織腫瘤。

sentences.english: Wellhung: I'm taking the sopping wet blouse from you. I drop it with a plop.
sentences.chinese: 我把浸透黏液的上衣接過來，撲通一聲扔到地上。

sentences.english: Intracellular mucin droplets are not identifiable.
Objective:To recognize CT findings of pseudomyxoma peritonei and to promote the identified diagnosis of the disease.
sentences.chinese: 目的認識和提高腹膜假性黏液瘤的CT表現及診斷。

sentences.english: He had bursitis, but they pretended he was in perfect health.
sentences.chinese: 他患有黏液囊炎，但他們佯稱他身體極好。

sentences.english: Objective To summarize the experience of perioperative surgical treatment of heart myxoma.
sentences.chinese: 目的總結心臟黏液瘤圍手術期的外科治療經驗。

sentences.english: However, thus far, there are no reports on lesions of the cecum.
sentences.chinese: 但是源自於盲腸之黏液性囊腺瘤仍然從未被報告過。

sentences.english: The results suggest that operation is the most effective method for treating cardiac myxomas.
sentences.chinese: 提示手術切除是治療心臟黏液瘤行之有效的方法。

sentences.english: Objective To review the experience of operation for cardiac myxomas.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討心臟黏液瘤手術治療經驗。
